title: Paytm - Mobile Recharge, UPI Payments & Bank App
description:
Paytm (पेटीएम), with over 300 million downloads, is India's most popular payments & recharge app! Make payments, send money or receive money in any linked bank account on Paytm. No need to run to ATM anymore as you can make safe & secure payments directly from your bank accounts with Paytm, most widely accepted payments app in India
Send money to any phone number +91 xxxxxxxxxx or scan QR codes at stores from app & pay directly from bank account
Make online payments from Paytm at all popular online stores & apps, make bank to bank money transfer, UPI payments, mobile recharge. Or play games like Ludo, Rummy, Teen Patti, 8 Ball Pool, Cricket Games on your phone & win prizes.
Bank to Bank Money Transfer
Money transfer made easy! Paytm app is the most secure payment app in India. Send & receive money directly in bank account at 0% charge.
Just enter your phone number > Signup > Link bank accounts > Create a UPI ID >  Start to pay (पे) directly through a bank account.
Wallet KYC is not mandatory.
Link any bank account for UPI payments : State Bank of India, HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, Citi Bank, Yes Bank, PNB, Bank of India, Axis Bank, Bank of Baroda, Canara Bank, Indusind Bank, Federal Bank, Union Bank of India, Karnataka Bank, all other BHIM UPI payments enabled banks
Pay directly through bank accounts or add money to wallet from your bank account.
Scan QR codes for sabse tez payments
Pay Online & Offline Stores
Link bank account via UPI or add money to Paytm wallet, scan QR codes & make fast payments. Pay (पे) by phone directly through Wallet or UPI by using QR code scanner at retail stores, restaurants, petrol pumps etc.
UPI App, Check Bank Balance Instantly
Link bank account to create UPI ID for quick money transfer or open a savings account with Paytm Payments Bank
Mobile Recharge & Bill Payments
Recharge your phone with the most preferred mobile recharge app. Make online recharge & pay bills for Airtel, BSNL, Idea, Vodafone, Jio. Get recharge offers on mobile recharge & bill payment on the most trusted mobile recharge app.
Pay for an app on Google Play Store with Google Play recharge code, make landline & broadband payment, toll recharge, insurance, gold, scratchcard & more
Entertainment: Movies, Amusement Parks & Events Tickets
Book tickets online for upcoming or latest movies & get amazing offers
Deals & Discount Vouchers
Buy deals & discount vouchers on brands & save money on your payment
Water, Gas, Electricity Bill Payments & More
Paying bills was never this easy. Make utility bill payments on your phone like Water, Gas bills & Electricity Bills, Credit card bill payments, challan payment, fee payment & more
DTH Recharge
Recharge online your DTH account on Paytm. Pay through Wallet or make UPI Payment for fast DTH recharge
Book Tickets for Train, Bus & Flight & Hotels
Spot any train, get live train running status on your phone & offers on flight, train & bus tickets to save money on ticket payments
LIC Premium Payment
Pay insurance premiums online & make LIC online premium payment easily
Metro Card Recharge
Pay by phone on your metro card recharge for Delhi Metro, Hyderabad Metro, Mumbai Metro
Paytm First Games
Download Paytm from Google Play Store & enjoy games like Rummy, Teen Patti, 8 Ball Pool, Ludo, Poker, Puzzle Games, Pool Games, Snake Games, Football, Poker etc. Play multiplayer games like Ludo, Clash Royale, Cricket Games, Solitaire, Rummy, Bubble Shooter or action games, sports & racing to win Paytm cash
Enjoy Online Shopping
Shop for top-selling products on Paytm Mall from a broad category range.
For 24x7 Customer Care: Find
customer care details here
See all
app permissions here
Visit our website:
www.paytm.com
